Verses: 1 pinbu Avargal Kadalukku Akkaraiyilulla Kadharenarudaiya Naattil Vandhaargal.
2 avar Padavilirundhu Iranginavudane, Asuththa Aaviyulla Oru Manushan Piredhakkallaraigalilirundhu Avarukku Edhiraaga Vandhaan.
3 avanudaiya Kudiyiruppu Kallaraigalile Irundhadhu; Avanai Sangiligalinaalum Katta Oruvanaalum Koodaadhirundhadhu.
4 avan Anegandharam Vilangugalinaalum Sangiligalinaalum Kattappattirundhum, Sangiligalai Muriththu, Vilangugalaith Thagarththuppoduvaan; Avanaiyadakka Oruvanaalum Koodaadhirundhadhu.
5 avan Eppozhudhum Iravum Pagalum, Malaigalilum Kallaraigalilum Irundhu, Kookkuralittu, Kallugalinaale Thannaik Kaayappaduththikkondirundhaan.
6 avan Yesuvaith Dhooraththile Kandapodhu, Odivandhu, Avaraippanindhukondu:
7 yesuve, Unnadhamaana Dhevanudaiya Kumaarane, Enakkum Umakkum Enna? Ennai Vedhanaippaduththaadhapadikkuth Dhevanperil Umakku Aanaiyendru Migundha Saththamittu Sonnaan.
8 enenil Avar Avanai Nokki: Asuththa Aaviye, Indha Manushanai Vittup Purappattup Po Endru Solliyirundhaar.
9 appozhudhu Avar Avanai Nokki: Un Per Ennavendru Kettaar. Adharku Avan: Naangal Anegaraayirukkirapadiyaal En Per Legiyon Endru Solli,
10 thangalai Andhath Thisaiyilirundhu Thuraththividaadhapadikku Avarai Migavum Vendikkondaan.
11 appozhudhu, Avvidaththil Malaiyaruge Anegam Pandrigal Koottamaaga Meyndhukondirundhadhu.
12 andhap Pisaasugalellaam Avarai Nokki: Pandrigalukkulle Pogumpadi, Avaigalukkulle Engalai Anuppum Endru Avarai Vendikkondana.

13 yesu Avaigalukku Uththaravu Koduththavudane, Asuththa Aavigal Purappattup Pandrigalukkul Poyina; Udane Erakkuraiya Irandaayiram Pandrigalulla Andhakkoottam Uyarndha Mettilirundhu Odi, Kadalile Paaindhu, Kadalil Amizhndhu Maandadhu.
14 pandrigalai Meyththavargal Odi, Idhaip Pattanaththilum Sutruppurangalilum Ariviththaargal. Appozhudhu Sambaviththadhaip Paarkkumpadi Janangal Purappattu;
15 yesuvinidaththil Vandhu, Legiyonaagiya Pisaasugal Pidiththirundhavan Vasthiranthariththu, Utkaarndhu, Buththi Thelindhirukkiradhaik Kandu, Bayandhaargal.
16 pisaasugal Pidiththirundhavanukkum Pandrigalukkum Sambaviththadhaik Kandavargalum Avargalukku Vivaramaai Sonnaargal.
17 appozhudhu Thangal Ellaigalai Vittuppogumpadi Avarai Vendikkollath Thodanginaargal.
18 appadiye Avar Padavil Erugirapozhudhu, Pisaasu Pidiththirundhavan, Avarodekooda Irukkumpadi Thanakku Uththaravukodukka Avarai Vendikkondaan.
19 yesu Avanukku Uththaravukodaamal: Nee Un Inaththaaridaththil Un Veettirkuppoi, Karththar Unakku Irangi, Unakku Seydhavaigalaiyellaam Avargalukku Ariviyendru Sonnaar.
20 andhappadi Avan Poi, Yesu Thanakku Seydhavaigalaiyellaam Thekkappoli Ennum Naattil Pirasiththampannaththodanginaan; Ellaarum Aachchariyappattaargal.
21 yesu Padavil Eri Marupadiyum Ikkaraikku Vandhu, Kadaloraththilirundhapodhu, Thiralaana Janangal Avaridaththil Koodivandhaargal.
22 appozhudhu, Jebaaalayaththalaivaril Oruvanaagiya Yaveeru Enbavan Vandhu, Avaraik Kandavudane, Avar Paadhaththile Vizhundhu:
23 en Kumaaraththi Marana Avasthaippadugiraal, Aval Aarokkiyamadaiyumpadikku Neer Vandhu, Avalmel Umadhu Kaigalai Vaiyum, Appozhudhu Pizhaippaal Endru Avarai Migavum Vendikkondaan.
24 avar Avanodekoodap Ponaar. Thiralaana Janangal Avarukkup Pinsendru Avarai Nerukkinaargal.
25 appozhudhu Pannirandu Varushamaaip Perumpaadulla Oru Sthiree,
26 anega Vaiththiyargalaal Migavum Varuththappattu, Thanakku Undaanavaigalaiyellaam Selavazhiththum, Satraagilum Gunamadaiyaamal Adhiga Varuththappadugirapozhudhu,
27 yesuvaikkuriththuk Kelvippattu: Naan Avarudaiya Vasthirangalaiyaagilum Thottaal Sosthamaaven Endru Solli;
28 janakkoottaththukkulle Avarukkup Pinnaaga Vandhu, Avarudaiya Vasthiraththaith Thottaal.
29 udane Avaludaiya Udhiraththin Ooral Nindrupoyitru; Andha Vedhanai Neengi Aarokkiyamadaindhadhai Aval Than Sareeraththil Unarndhaal.
30 udane Yesu Thammilirundhu Vallamai Purappattadhaith Thamakkul Arindhu, Janakkoottaththukkulle Thirumbi: En Vasthirangalaith Thottadhu Yaar Endru Kettaar.
31 avarudaiya Seeshargal Avarai Nokki: Thiralaana Janangal Ummai Nerukkikkondirukkiradhai Neer Kandum, Ennaith Thottadhu Yaar Endru Ketkireere Endraargal.
32 idhai Seydhavalaik Kaanumpadikku Avar Sutrilum Paarththaar.
33 thannidaththile Sambaviththadhai Arindha Andha Sthireeyaanaval Bayandhu, Nadungi, Avar Munbaaga Vandhu Vizhundhu, Unmaiyaiyellaam Avarukku Sonnaal.
34 avar Avalaip Paarththu: Magale, Un Visuvaasam Unnai Ratchiththadhu, Nee Samaadhaanaththodepoi, Un Vedhanai Neengi, Sugamaayiru Endraar.
35 avar Ippadippesikkondirukkaiyil, Jebaaalayaththalaivanudaiya Veettilirundhu Silar Vandhu: Ummudaiya Kumaaraththi Mariththupponaal, Ini En Podhagarai Varuththappaduththugireer Endraargal.
36 avargal Sonna Vaarththaiyai Yesu Kettavudane, Jebaaalayaththalaivanai Nokki: Bayappadaadhe, Visuvaasamullavanaayiru Endru Solli;
37 pedhuruvaiyum, Yaakkobaiyum, Yaakkobin Sagodharan Yovaanaiyum Thavira, Veroruvarum Thammode Varugiradharku Idankodaamal;
38 jebaaalayaththalaivanudaiya Veettile Vandhu, Sandhadiyaiyum Migavum Azhudhu Pulambugiravargalaiyum Kandu,
39 ulle Piravesiththu: Neengal Sandhadipanni Azhugiradhenna? Pillai Marikkavillai, Niththiraiyaayirukkiraal Endraar.

40 adharkaaga Avaraip Paarththu Nagaiththaargal. Ellaaraiyum Avar Veliye Pogappanni, Pillaiyin Thagappanaiyum, Thaayaiyum, Thammode Vandhavargalaiyum Azhaiththukkondu, Pillaiyirundha Idaththil Piravesiththu,
41 pillaiyin Kaiyaippidiththu: Thaleeththaagoomi Endraar; Adharku, Sirupenne Ezhundhiru Endru Unakku Sollugiren Endru Arththamaam.
42 udane Sirupen Ezhundhu Nadandhaal; Aval Pannirandu Vayadhullavalaayirundhaal. Avargal Migundha Aachchariyappattup Piramiththaargal.
43 adhai Oruvarukkum Ariviyaadhapadi Avargalukku Urudhiyaagak Kattalaiyittu, Avalukku Aagaarankodukkumpadi Sonnaar.
